alert.note: Alert for East Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 22 at 8:47PM MST until November 23 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...East Platte County including Interstate 25 between Glendo and Chugwater, and also including the city of Wheatland. * WHEN...11 PM MST this evening until 2 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
